component.name: Velacritty
component.summary: A cross-platform, OpenGL terminal emulator (Velacritty fork)

description.p: Velacritty is a fork of Alacritty, a modern terminal emulator that comes with sensible defaults, but allows for extensive configuration. By integrating with other applications, rather than reimplementing their functionality, it manages to provide a flexible set of features with high performance.
This fork adds enhanced visual improvements and user experience features while maintaining full compatibility with Alacritty configurations.
